has_value_from

Determine if T can be converted to value.

Synopsis

Defined in header <boost/json/value_from.hpp> 

template<
    class T>
using has_value_from = see-below;
Description

If T can be converted to value via a call to value_from, the static data member value is defined as true. Otherwise, value is defined as false.

See Also

value_from

Convenience header <boost/json.hpp>
